definition: Sun Moon Lake in Nantou County, Taiwan
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]
deep pool/pond/pit (dialect)/depression
surname Tan

sentences.english: The Shao people were moved from their beloved Lalu to the upper Sun Moon Village.
sentences.chinese: 在少人從他們心愛的拉魯到上日月潭村。

sentences.english: The most popular destinations are Taipei and the Sun and Moon Lake.
sentences.chinese: 最受歡迎的景點是臺北和日月潭。

sentences.english: It's helpful for the sponsor to do promotion and marketing in holding kayak Marathon in Sun Moon Lake in the future.
sentences.chinese: 以上結果提供日月潭主辦單位及未來相當研究參考。

sentences.english: We’ll have to take steps to protect the lake’s scenery and ecology.
sentences.chinese: 我們將採取措施保護日月潭的風景和生態平衡。

sentences.english: I enjoy taking a trip to Sun-moon Lake.
Sun Moon Lake is located 748 meters above sea level.
sentences.chinese: 日月潭的高度爲海拔748公尺。

sentences.english: Alishan and Sun Moon Lake are the centers of some of the best known stories.
sentences.chinese: 阿里山和日月潭是一些最知名傳說的故事中心。

sentences.english: Several hydroelectric power plants have been built in the Sun Moon Lake since 1919.
sentences.chinese: 1919年開始，日月潭周邊建了幾座水力發電廠。

sentences.english: When did the man go to Sun-Moon Lake?
sentences.chinese: 這位男士什麼時候去過日月潭？

sentences.english: If you go there, you should not miss Sun_Moon Lake and Mount Ali.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去那裏，你千萬不要錯過日月潭和阿里山。

definition: Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
Taroko gorge national park in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], Taiwan/Taroko ethnic group Taiwan
Alishan township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Alishan, mountain range in Taiwan
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Qijin or Chichin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Tainan (city and county in Taiwan)
Beitou or Peitou district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Jiaoxi or Chiaohsi township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Puli, town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
Cape Eluanpi or Eluanbi, southernmost point of Taiwan Island
Jiufen (or Jioufen or Chiufen), mountainside town in north Taiwan, former gold mining town, used as the setting for two well-known movies
Nantou city and county in central Taiwan
